text:
Lori Metcalf <lmetcalf@seattleacademy.org>
9:33AM (9 minutes ago)
to me, Christine
Hi Christine and Rob,
Hearing that Max and your family are having a great experience at SAAS is wonderful. I am happy to set up a Zoom call for the three of us to discuss
Adrian joining us at SAAS.
In the meantime, I strongly encourage you to complete the Ravenna application for Adrian so the process can start as soon as possible. We cannot
make enrollment decisions without an application, and we will need it regardless of a midyear transfer or entry next year. The sooner the application is
complete, the better.
I am available for a Zoom call next Thursday between 8:00 and 11:30 or Friday between 12:30 and 4:00. Would either work for you?
Thanks
Lori

metadata.section: If Anna Lisa could approve a Teams call to lock this down asap, that would be super. It's a big deal to me. Please let me know if you disagree.
